attributes.action: Lift quarantine for those coming from red list countries.
attributes.additional_details: Our children need a change. Their mental health and emotional wellbeing has been dramatically affected by this pandemic. Please lift the quarantine in hotels for those vaccinated and for vulnerable people.
attributes.background: People coming back from red list countries and who already had a second jab should quarantine in their homes instead of imposed hotels that many people cannot afford. If not at least the government should nominate affordable hotels to people in this category.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Scrap quarantine for vaccinated people arriving in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575612

Allow fully vaccinated people coming from red list countries to isolate at home: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588072
